description: This Course introduces to the concepts of Project Management, more specifically on the Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification. The PMP Certification is a Globally Recognized Certification in the domain of Project Management. This Course is covered through video lectures by a faculty of repute. The Course is tightly based on the concepts outlined in PMBOK 5th edition and covers topics such as the 7 steps to PMP, Defining Projects, Project LifeCycle, Models of Project LifeCycle, Organizational Influences, Project Management Process, Process Group Interaction, Project Interaction and a description on all the Knowledge Areas. This Course is intended to students and professionals in the Project Management space and to candidates appearing for the PMP examination
title: PMP - Key Concepts of Project Management
